detail.description: CEAT, established in 1958, is one of the largest tyre manufacturers and one of the fastest-growing tyre companies in India. CEAT became a part of the RPG Group in 1982. It is amongst the Top 25 best workplaces in Manufacturing by GPTW for 2022.[1]
